page.description: The {SIZEINDEX} command allows you to dynamically select between two sets of dimensions for a control. The {SIZEINDEX=} command turns off the command.
page.syntax: {SIZEINDEX= Expression } [ Width1, Height1 ; Width2, Height2 : Variable_Name ^# Choices [ ! Event ][ ? Enabled ] ] {SIZEINDEX=}

argument.name: Expression
argument.description: Character. An expression that evaluates to 0 ( Width1, Height1 ) or 1 ( Width2, Height2 ).

argument.name: Width1
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control in characters, using the default font, which is Arial 8.

argument.name: Height1
argument.description: Numeric. The height of the control in lines, using the default font, which is Arial 8.

argument.name: Width2
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control in characters, using the default font, which is Arial 8.

argument.name: Height2
argument.description: Numeric. The height of the control in lines, using the default font, which is Arial 8.
